items.sentence: I\'m absolutely certain you\'re wrong about that.
I\'m assuming French isn\'t your native language.
Tom couldn\'t resist the temptation to kiss Mary.
Tom couldn\'t take it anymore so he quit his job.
Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary laughed at him.
Tom didn\'t actually ever go on a date with Mary.
Tom didn\'t arrive until it was already too late.
I can\'t remember the last time I was this happy.
I can\'t resist a woman who knows what she wants.
Tom asked Mary if she would teach his son French.
